officialTitle: Department of Nursing, Chang Gung Memorial Hospital-Kaohsiung Medical Center,RN, MSN
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women, aged \>20 years
* newly diagnosed early breast cancer (stages 0-II)
* no surgery yet
* no metastases
* tumor size \<3 cm

Exclusion Criteria:

•tumor located \<2 cm from the nipple
